markdown:
Summary : This is a product label for "Garden of Life Grass Fed Collagen Creamer" in creamy vanilla flavor, highlighting its nutritional content and intended benefits.

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • The main subject is a cylindrical container of dietary supplement powder.
  • The label is predominantly light blue and white, with the "Garden of Life" logo at the top.
  • The product is described as "grass fed COLLAGEN CREAMER" with creamy vanilla flavor.
  • The label states it contains 10g collagen, MCTs, probiotics, and is made with coconut milk.
  • Additional claims: "Energy, Beauty & Joints", "Dairy Free", "12 Servings", "Net Wt 11.64 oz (330 g)".
  • The label also notes "Dietary Supplement".

Technical Details :
  • The logo features a farmer in a field with fruits and vegetables.
  • There is a vanilla flower illustration near the bottom right.
  • The text is clear, with key features and benefits prominently displayed.

Spatial Relationships :
  • The logo is centered at the top, with the product name and features below.
  • The flavor and serving information are at the bottom of the label.

Analysis :
  • The label is designed to emphasize the product's health benefits, natural ingredients, and suitability for those avoiding dairy.
  • The use of blue and white suggests a clean, health-oriented product.
  • The inclusion of serving size and net weight provides clear information for consumers. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.207,t=0.079,r=0.793,b=0.976), with ID 167c0885-07fa-49a3-8d81-4a47b01b3420 -->
